newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mitsubishi Electric to make commercial satellites.
newsitem.headline: Mitsubishi Electric to make commercial satellites.

text.p: Mitsubishi Electric Corp said on Monday that it plans to become the first Japanese company to manufacture commercial satellites when it begins production by 2000.
A Mitsubishi Electric spokesman said the company has been making satellite components, such as telecommunications equipment and antennae.
The move is aimed at further expanding the company's satellite business in the hope of taking advantage of growing demand for satellite broadcasting services and portable phone systems, he said.
The company hopes to expand annual sales in its space-related business from the current 40 billion yen to 100 billion in 2000, the spokesman said.
